# https://www.sil.org/resources/publications/entry/42321
$bow = [-\ $] ;  # Beginning of word.

::NFC;
::Lower;
a → æ;
b → b;
c → ʔ;
d → d;
e → ɛ;
f → f;
g → g;
h → h;
i → i;
# Phonemic
#$bow } j → ʒ;
#i } j { [$] → ʒ;
#[aeiou] } j { i → ʒ;
j → j;
k → k;
l → l;
m → m;
n → n;
o → ɔ;
q → g͜b;
s → s;
t → t;
u → u;
#Phonemic
#wi → ʋi;
#we → ʋɛ;
#i } w { [$] → ʋ;
w → w;
::NFC;
